home.title: Empowering open-source Bitcoin builders in Brazil
home.subtitle: Bitcoin’s long-term success depends on a diverse, global community of open-source contributors — one that reflects the people who rely on it most.
home.about: Vinteum exists to help make that vision a reality. We’re a non-profit Bitcoin research and development center focused on supporting developers in Brazil. We train, mentor, and fund contributors to work on Bitcoin Core, the Lightning Network, and other critical infrastructure — growing a Bitcoin builder community from the ground up and creating a sustainable pipeline of open-source contributors for the future.

footer.newsletter-subtitle: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent directly to your inbox.
